Sentencas: Oxygen transport was examined around the O-2/cathode/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) interfaces in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: To visualize the kinetics of oxygen transport, isotope oxygen exchange (O-16/O-18 exchange) and secondary ion mass spectrometry analysis (SIMS) were adopted for La0.85Sr0.15MnO3-mesh and gold (Au)-mesh cathodes.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: The mesh cathode surfaces promoted oxygen adsorption and surface oxygen exchange.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: Oxygen bulk diffusion in the mesh cathode was observed only at the La0.85Sr0.15MnO3-mesh.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: The active sites for oxygen incorporation were compared at the YSZ surfaces after removing the mesh cathodes.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: The La0.85Sr0.15MnO3-mesh/YSZ interface can be the active site for oxygen incorporation as well as the triple phase boundary (TPB).
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: On the other hand, the Au/YSZ interface showed low 180 concentration, and the active sites were limited to the TPB lines.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: Most active sites for oxygen incorporation were the O-2/cathode/YSZ interface (TPB) for La0.85Sr0.15MnO3-mesh and Au-mesh from the line analysis of the SIMS images.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique

Sentencas: The expansion of the oxygen incorporation active site around the TPB was discussed on the basis of SIMS imaging analysis and electrochemical analysis.
Titulo: Imaging of oxygen transport at SOFC cathode/electrolyte interfaces by a novel technique
